metadata.synopsis: VB that is played when you approach the Distillery in SCL.Version for 2 characters.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Approach the Distillery in SCL with 2 characters

1.speaker: Player
1.text: That sign above. This must be a brewery - or distillery.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Hm. A place like this must hide all manner of secrets.
